subject: Letters
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mary Jane Schriner died on Saturday at 79, leaving behind well-preserved letters from George Steinbrenner filled with warmth and some of the impatience that he would be known widely for.
snippet: Mary Jane Schriner died on Saturday at 79, leaving behind well-preserved letters from George Steinbrenner filled with warmth and some of the impatience that he would be known widely for.
